Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are given an event log with three cases. Lets analyze the activities and their sequences. Case 1: RA VF AE RMI VF AD SC AC Case 2: RA VF AE AD SC AC Case 3: RA VF AE RMI RMI VF AD SC AC

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We note The main flow RA VF AE then either AD Case2 or RMI then VF again then AD for Case1 and Case3 There is a possibility of repeating RMI and VF multiple times Case3 has two RMI in a row then VF

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: The typical pattern would be RA VF AE if missing info RMI VF and this can repeat then AD SC AC

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The loop operator A is executed then either exit the loop or execute B and then A again This is a loop that first executes A and then we have a choice either stop or do B and then A again

Name: Abductive Reasoning - NE
Text: To model multiple RMI we can use loop RMI tau to allow zero or more RMI then VF after the loop using XOR tau loop VF

Name: Validation - NE
Text: In Case2 we would have an extra VF after AE but the log shows no second VF it goes directly to AD

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Adjust the structure to have XOR after AE with one branch directly to AD and the other branch to the loop RMI tau then VF then AD

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: The structure is XOR skip loop then AD or do loop RMI multiple times VF AD

Name: Validation - PE
Text: This matches Case1 with one RMI then VF AD Case2 directly AD Case3 two RMI then VF AD
